xml.name: version
xml.version_command: echo $(R --version | grep version | grep -v GNU)", scater version" $(R --vanilla --slave -e "library(scater); cat(sessionInfo()\$otherPkgs\$scater\$Version)" 2> /dev/null | grep -v -i "WARNING: ")

citations.citation: @misc{githubbioconductor-scater-scripts, author = {LastTODO, FirstTODO}, year = {TODO}, title = {bioconductor-scater-scripts}, publisher = {GitHub}, journal = {GitHub repository}, url = {https://github.com/ebi-gene-expression-group/bioconductor-scater-scripts}, }
